[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”board-director”]

Kolpana Binte Akbar

Chairmen

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”board-director”]

Jibon Hossain

Managing Director & Head of Company

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”board-director”]

Md Rubel Hossain

Deputy Managing Director

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”board-director”]

Company Director

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”board-director”]

M.K Zaman

Director of Sweater Dept.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”board-director”]

Rayhan Rahman

In Charge of Knit Jersy Dept. & Development

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”board-director”]

Al-Amin Faruque

In Charge of Woven Dept. & Development

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”board-director”]

Shaker Rasel

In Charge of Sweater Dept.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”board-director”]

Rawshan Ara Mowmita

Head of Accounts & Commercial Export Dept.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Speech” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”our-speech-title”][vc_column_text]In quality, production & work place. We constantly strive for better solutions, environment friendly products, quality & productivity by investing adequately infrastructure, technology and human resources. Our experienced and dedicated management team and professionally skilled work force is continuously striving towards the common goal of our company to identify the needs of our customers and provide professional support to meet the ever increasing quality demand of our valued clients. Our vision and mission is to be a highly reputed garment manufacturer in the international market as well as contribute into the national economy doing best quality products following all the safety measures in order to mitigate all complaint factors for the employees, customers and the environment. Our company has been able to earn a reputation which is well recognized by most of our valuable clients.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
